commit message:
Add a new location field to specify a VIA location for direction search.

Closes #68
Add little graphics to recent and favourite trips
enable strict mode to start hunting down the violations

Always select current page in navigation drawer.

Fixes #186
Do not show keyboard and location list on startup

Add setting for whether app should always exist

when pressing back in start screen.
switch from OSMBonusPack to pure osmdroid
properly color new graphics for recent trips when using dark theme

Fix crash on fresh installs caused by database bug

introduced by via locations.

Fixes #189

Fix bug where Departure Delay Overlaped the Time

when no position exists for the departure.

Fixes #188
Allow to navigate trip results and map without entering lockscreen PIN.
Return 10 instead of 5 nearby stations and display them better.
Better icons to symbolize start and final station of a trip on the map
